markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">
[Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 371 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Tiny clinging hairs sprout across the creature's hands and feet, offering purchase on nearly any surface. The target gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The duration increases to 1 hour.
name: Spider Climb
